statements: SELECT * FROM patient_activity;
SELECT patient_id, activity_level FROM patient_activity WHERE activity_level > 5;
SELECT timestamp, activity_level FROM patient_activity WHERE sleep_pattern < 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_activity WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT patient_id, sleep_pattern FROM patient_activity WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sleep_pattern ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_activity WHERE activity_level > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(activity_level) AS max_activity_level FROM patient_activity GROUP BY patient_id HAVING max_activity_level > 5;
SELECT DATE(timestamp) AS date, AVG(sleep_pattern) AS average_sleep FROM patient_activity WHERE DATE(timestamp) = '2022-01-15';
SELECT activity_level, sleep_pattern, COUNT(*) AS count_activities FROM patient_activity WHERE sleep_pattern < 5 GROUP BY activity_level ORDER BY count_activities DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_activity WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY activity_level ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_activity WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT activity_level, recorded_at FROM patient_activity WHERE activity_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM sleep_pattern WHERE sleep_quality >= 7;
SELECT patient_id, sleep_start, sleep_end FROM sleep_pattern WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT patient_id, sleep_quality FROM sleep_pattern WHERE sleep_start BETWEEN '2023-01-15' AND '2023-01-16';
SELECT * FROM patient_activity ORDER BY activity_level DESC;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(activity_level) FROM patient_activity GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) FROM sleep_pattern GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT patient_id, AVG(sleep_quality) AS avg_sleep_quality FROM sleep_pattern GROUP BY patient_id HAVING AVG(sleep_quality) > 3;
SELECT * FROM sleep_pattern WHERE sleep_quality BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY sleep_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_activity WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT patient_id, activity_level FROM patient_activity ORDER BY activity_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM sleep_patterns WHERE patient_id = 456 AND sleep_start > '2021-01-01';
SELECT sleep_id, sleep_start, sleep_end FROM sleep_patterns WHERE patient_id IN (789, 890);
SELECT device_id, device_type, device_serial FROM wearable_devices WHERE device_type = 'Fitbit' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, activity_level FROM patient_activity WHERE activity_level > 0.5 ORDER BY recorded_at DESC;
SELECT sleep_start, sleep_end FROM sleep_patterns WHERE patient_id = 12345 AND sleep_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY sleep_start ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_type, device_serial FROM wearable_devices WHERE patient_id = 54321 AND device_type = 'Fitbit' ORDER BY device_id;

SELECT patient_id, activity_level, recorded_at FROM patient_activity LEFT JOIN sleep_patterns ON patient_activity.patient_id = sleep_patterns.patient_id WHERE activity_level < 0.3 ORDER BY recorded_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_activity WHERE patient_id = 67890;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM sleep_patterns WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM wearable_devices;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT device_type, device_serial_num FROM wearable_devices WHERE device_type = 'Fitbit';
SELECT name, activity_level, activity_timestamp FROM patients JOIN activity_levels ON patients.patient_id = activity_levels.patient_id;
SELECT name, age, device_type, device_serial_num FROM patients JOIN wearable_devices ON patients.patient_id = wearable_devices.patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, sleep_start, sleep_end FROM sleep_patterns ORDER BY sleep_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_info;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_info ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT activity_type, activity_duration FROM activity_data WHERE activity_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT sleep_quality FROM sleep_data WHERE sleep_duration > 8;
SELECT heart_rate, recorded_at FROM heart_rate_data WHERE patient_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM patient_info WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT activity_type, activity_duration FROM activity_data WHERE activity_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_info JOIN sleep_data ON patient_info.patient_id = sleep_data.patient_id WHERE sleep_duration > 8
SELECT heart_rate FROM heart_rate_data WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND recorded_at BETWEEN '2022-10-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-10-31 23:59:59'
SELECT SUM(steps_count) AS total_steps FROM step_count_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_steps > 10000
